mapper.select: select e.*, p.price from expert_review e join payment p on e.sell_num = p.sell_num where e.sell_num IN( select p.sell_num from user_table u, payment p where u.user_id = p.user_id and u.user_id = #{user_id} )

select e.*, c.*, i.*
from expert_review e JOIN car_general_info c on e.SELL_NUM = c.SELL_NUM JOIN car_images i on e.SELL_NUM = i.SELL_NUM
where e.user_id =#{user_id} and c.del_state=0 AND i.img_url LIKE '%' || '_1.' || '%'
